wiki.summary: "Perfect Night" is a song recorded by South Korean girl group LE SSERAFIM. It was released on October 27, 2023 alongside its music video. The track was written, composed & arranged by Amanda "Kiddo A.I." Ibanez, Jorge Luis Perez, Jr., Lauren Aquilina, Marcus Andersson, 13's Megatone & SCORE, Niklas Jarelius Persson, Ninos Hanna, Sofia Quinn, Zikai, "hitman" bang, and member Yunjin. Read more on Last.fm.
